prompt: Create a user role management interface with a clean, corporate design using a blue and white color scheme. The app bar should display 'User Role Management' in white text on a blue background with a settings icon. Include a search bar with a subtle blue border and placeholder text 'Search by name or email'. The main content should be a scrollable list of user cards with a clean layout, each featuring a circular avatar on the left, user name in bold, email in gray, and role badges ('Admin' in red, 'Editor' in blue, 'Viewer' in green) on the right. Add an 'Edit Role' button with a blue background at the bottom of each card. Use a white background with subtle card shadows.
